metadata.title: CVE-2024-3653 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Undertow. This issue requires enabling thelearning-push handler in the server's config, which is disabled by default,leaving the maxAge config in the handler unconfigured. The default is -1,which makes the handler vulnerable. If someone overwrites that config, theserver is not subject to the attack. The attacker needs to be able to reachthe server with a normal HTTP request.

criterions.comment: undertow package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
